solution:
Solution:
\(
\begin{aligned}
& 4 x+6-7 x+9=18 \\
& -3 x+15=18 \\
& -3 x=18-15=3 \\
& \Rightarrow x=-1
\end{aligned}
\)

Solution:
\(
\begin{aligned}
 2 x+6=3 x+9-3 \\
\Rightarrow 2 x+6=3 x+6 \\
2 x-3 x=6-6 \\
-x=0 \Rightarrow x=0
\end{aligned}
\)

Solution:
\(
\begin{aligned}
& -5 x+3=2 x+10 \\
& -5 x-2 x=10-3=7 \\
& -7 x=7 \Rightarrow x=\frac{7}{-7}=-1 \\
& x=-1
\end{aligned}
\)

Solution:
\(
\begin{aligned}
3 x-12 x & =24-9 x \\
-9 x & =24-9 x \\
& -9 x+9 x=24
\end{aligned}
\)

Solution:
\(
\begin{aligned}
& 9 x-7=-34 \\
& 9 x=-34+7=-27 \\
& 9 x=-27 \Rightarrow x=-\frac{24}{9}=-3 \\
& x=-3
\end{aligned}
\)

Solution:
\(
\begin{aligned}
-8 x+3-2 x & =-6 x+3-4 x \\
-10 x+3 & =-10 x+3 .
\end{aligned}
\)

Solution:
\(
\begin{aligned}
10 x+3+10 x & =13 x-3+7 x \\
20 x+3 & =20 x-3
\end{aligned}
\)

Solution:
\(
 \begin{aligned}
-3(2 x-8) & =-12 \\
2 x-8 & =\frac{-12}{-3}=4 \\
2 x & =4+8=12 \\
x & =12 / 2=6 \\
\Rightarrow & x = 6
\end{aligned}
\)

Solution:

\(
\begin{aligned}
4(6+2 x) & =0 \\
6+2 x & =0 \\
2 x & =-6 \Rightarrow x=-6 / 2 \\
x & =-3
\end{aligned}
\)

Solution:
\(
\begin{aligned}
-3+3 x=-2 x-2 \\
-3+3 x+2 x+2=0 \\
5 x-1=0 \\
x=1 / 5
\end{aligned}
\)

Solution:
\(
\begin{aligned}
6+3 x & =5(x-1)-3(x-2) \\
6+3 x & =5 x-5-3 x+6 \\
6+3 x & =2 x+1 \\
x & =-5
\end{aligned}
\)

Solution:
\(
\begin{aligned}
& \frac{n}{10}=9-\frac{n}{5} \\
& \frac{n}{10}=\frac{45-n}{5} \\
& 5 n=10(45-n) \\
& n=2(45-n) \\
& n=90-2 n \\
& 3 n=90 \Rightarrow n=30
\end{aligned}
\)

Solution:
\(
\begin{aligned}
x-\frac{3}{4} & =-2 x \\
x+2 x & =\frac{3}{4} \\
3 x & =\frac{3}{4} \\
\Rightarrow x & =1 / 4
\end{aligned}
\)

Solution:
\(
\begin{aligned}
a-\frac{a}{3}+\frac{a}{5} & =26 \\
\frac{15 a-5 a+3 a}{15} & =26 \\
13 a & = 26 \times 15 \\
a & =\frac{26 \times 15}{13} \\
a & =30
\end{aligned}
\)

Soluion:
\(
\begin{aligned}
& \frac{3-5 y}{4}=\frac{2-4 y}{3} \\
& 9-15 y=8-16 y \\
& 1=-y \\
& \Rightarrow y=-1
\end{aligned}
\)
